text: @neutralthinker🚨 Europe, are you paying attention? 🇺🇦 Ukraine's gas storage sites are under attack by Russia! 💥 Not only do they supply 28% of EU's gas needs, but they've also helped keep your lights on during previous winters. ❄️As the war rages on, Ukraine's energy infrastructure is hanging by a thread. 🤯 If Russia continues its attacks, how will Ukraine face another winter? 💔 The fate of Europe's energy supply hangs in balance. It's time for Europe to step up and support Ukraine, not just with words but with actions! 🇪🇺💪Let's break the cycle of dependency on Russian energy and stand with Ukraine in solidarity! 🌟 Who's with me? 🤝
